section.title: &slsa; Support
section.para: &sls; (&slsa;) Host OS KVM and/or supported &slsa; guests have been tested and qualified by &vendor; to run on &kw-hos;. Refer to the published compatibility matrix for your version of &kw-hos; at the following URL . &vendor; is one of largest &suse; OEMs with follow the sun global support coverage.

listitem.para: &vendor; customers who have purchased both &kw-hos; and &slsa; subscriptions with support from &vendor; will have one number to call for troubleshooting, fault isolation and support from &vendor; technical support specialists in &kw-hos; and &suse; technologies. If the problem is isolated to &slsa; software itself the issue will be replicated on a &suse; certified platform and escalated to &suse; for resolution.

&vendor; will troubleshoot and fault isolate an issue at the &productname; software level. If &kw-hos; software is excluded as the cause of the problem, then customers who did not purchase &slsa; support from &vendor; will be directed to the vendor from whom they purchased &slsa; for continued support.
